translations: 难忘的，不可磨灭的；擦不掉的，无法去除的

sentences.sentence: My visit to India in 1986 left an indelible impression on me.
sentences.translation: 1986年的印度之行给我留下了难忘的印象。

sentences.sentence: It will remain an indelible stain in his memory.
sentences.translation: 这将成为他记忆中一个不可磨灭的污点。

sentences.sentence: It will remain an indelible stain on his memory.
sentences.translation: 这将成为他记忆中一个不可磨灭的污点。
